H2: Education
• PhD in Computer Science,Department of Computer Science,ETH Zurich, Switzerland. Supervised by Prof.Bertrand Meyer.
• PhD in Engineering Science,Department of Computer Science and Technology,Nanjing University, China. Supervised by Prof. Guoliang Zheng and Prof.Xuandong Li.
• Bachelor in Science,Department of Computer Science and Technology,Nanjing University, China.



H2: Research Interests
• Automated Program Repair
• Automated Software Testing
• Software Fault Localization
• Mining Software Repositories
